'''Memories Flowing With Color''' is the [[Tribal Chronicles]] chapter for [[Masters of the Night-Wind]].
==List of Acts==
* Act I - [[Calling from the Masters of the Night-Wind]]
** Requirements: {{Quest|40;Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame (Quest)|display=bullet|requirements=1}}
* Act II - [[Legendary "Color"]]
** Requirements: {{Quest|40;Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame (Quest)|display=bullet|requirements=1}}
* Act III - [[The Truth of the Battle of Seven Colors]]
** Requirements: {{Quest|40;Incandescent Ode of Resurrection|display=bullet|requirements=1}}

==Summary==
{{Description|The Masters of the Night-Wind have upheld an ancient custom for generations — using colorful woven scrolls to record the history of Natlan. It is precisely because of this tradition that you, who have stumbled upon the tribe, have been entrusted with a mission...}}
===Act I - Calling from the Masters of the Night-Wind===
{{Main|Calling from the Masters of the Night-Wind}}
{{Description|After passing the tests set by the Chief of the Masters of the Night-Wind, you realize that you possess the ability to discern a particular "color," which seems to be the key to completing your mission...}}
''(To be added.)''

===Act II - Legendary "Color"===
{{Main|Legendary "Color"}}
{{Description|Even after bringing back the dye as per Biram's request, you are still unable to recreate that unique "color." However, neither you nor Biram choose to give up...}}
''(To be added.)''

===Act III - The Truth of the Battle of Seven Colors===
{{Main|The Truth of the Battle of Seven Colors}}
{{Description|After returning from the ancient battlefield, you finally understand everything that Citlali has borne alone these past three centuries. So too has the veil over a secret that has puzzled you and Biram for some time now been lifted. Yet it seems you have gained something even more precious than the joy of completing your mission — a promise that will last a lifetime.}}
{{Transclude|The Truth of the Battle of Seven Colors|Summary}}
